remarks: Deduction version of bound-variable hypothesis builder ~ nfop .  This shows how the deduction version of a not-free theorem such as ~ nfop can be created from the corresponding not-free inference theorem. (Contributed by NM, 4-Feb-2008.)
statement:
nfopd.2 $e |- ( ph -> F/_ x A ) $.
nfopd.3 $e |- ( ph -> F/_ x B ) $.
nfopd $p |- ( ph -> F/_ x <. A , B >. ) $.
